definition: flour/noodles/(of food) soft (not crunchy)/(slang) (of a person) ineffectual/spineless
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc
tool/device/utensil/equipment/instrument/talent/ability/to possess/to have/to provide/to furnish/to state/classifier for devices, coffins, dead bodies

sentences.english: A charter is a mask; the lie lurks beneath it.
sentences.chinese: 宪章是个假面具，盖在那下面的是谎话。

sentences.english: We tore from them the mask of democracy.
sentences.chinese: 我们撕下了他们民主的假面具。

sentences.english: You can drop the moonlight and magnolias , Scarlett.
sentences.chinese: 你可以撕下你的假面具了，斯佳丽。

sentences.english: Look at her, a mask of innocence. ;
sentences.chinese: 你瞧瞧她那一副天真的假面具。

sentences.english: He went masked ball without masking his face.
sentences.chinese: 他去参加化装舞会而没戴假面具。

sentences.english: Violence may also put on the mask of law.
sentences.chinese: 暴力也可能戴着法律的假面具。

sentences.english: He ripped away the mask of pretence which covered their activities.
sentences.chinese: 他剥掉了遮盖他们行动的假面具。

sentences.english: The moon made his face into a silver mask.
sentences.chinese: 月光使他的脸像是戴上了银色的假面具。

definition: tall conical paper hat worn as a public humiliation/dunce cap/(fig.) flattery
to expose/to unmask/to see through (a lie etc)
outside appearance and inner reality differ (idiom); not what it seems/saying one thing but meaning sth different
